content: I didn't think about the salsa or hot sauce yet, but I do have a few options in mind. I was thinking of making a simple pico de gallo with some diced tomatoes, onions, jalapeños, cilantro, and lime juice. I also have some chipotle peppers in adobo sauce that I could use to make a smoky chipotle salsa. Or, if I want to keep things simple, I could just serve it with some store-bought salsa or hot sauce. What do you think?
